subject: Football
Fashion and Apparel
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: One of the longest lawsuits involving the N.F.L. appears to be nearing an end as American Needle, a cap maker that sued the league after Reebok became the league’s exclusive apparel provider, agreed to settle.
snippet: One of the longest lawsuits involving the N.F.L. appears to be nearing an end as American Needle, a cap maker that sued the league after Reebok became the league’s exclusive apparel provider, agreed to settle.
